doc.name: unicodeText

syntax.example: set the unicodeText of [chunk of] field to unicodeString
set the unicodeText of button to unicodeString

doc.summary: Specifies the text in a field, represented as Unicode (double-byte characters).

examples.example: set the unicodeText of field 1 to URL "binfile:Chinese.txt"
set the unicodeText of line 4 of field 1 to mySavedText

example.p: set the unicodeText of button "languages" to tUnicodeLanguageList

history.changed: allows setting / getting the content of field and buttons as UTF-16

description.overview: Use the unicodeText property to set or get the contents of a field or button as UTF-16.
description.value: The unicodeText is a UTF-16 string.

comments.p: Use the unicodeText property to display a unicode string in a field or retrieve the text displayed in a field as a unicode string.
Use the unicodeText property to set the menu contents of a button(if it is a menu) to a unicode string. To set the label of a button to a unicode string use the unicodeLabel property.
